entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High 16. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness near noon. 60 percent chance of showers this afternoon with risk of a thunderstorm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming south 20 late this afternoon. High 16. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Friday 14 April 2023
